Samiran Gode

I am a Project Assistant at IISc working on project EqWATER. My work involves detecting leaks in a cyber-physical water distribution system which would be applied to the Bangalore water supply. Before this, I was an Area Manager Intern at Amazon for about 6 months. I have spent the summer after my junior year at TIFR, working on Image Processing and the summer after my sophomore year at Putzmeister, working on Robotics.

I completed my undergrad from BITS Pilani, Pilani in 2019.

Interested in everything tech!
